scenes.background: [Bob] leans back in his chair, crossing his arms.
scenes.description: 'Balancing everyone’s preferences might lead to more confusion.'

options.text: We can create a poll to see which option is preferred by most.
options.analysis: You proposed a democratic approach, showing good perception, empathy, and social skills, but self-regulation and motivation were moderate.

options.text: It’s true, but we need to consider everyone’s feelings to avoid dissatisfaction.
options.analysis: You highlighted the importance of inclusivity, showing good empathy and self-regulation, but social skill and perception were moderate.

options.text: Maybe we should go with the majority’s choice to keep it simple.
options.analysis: You suggested a pragmatic approach, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.
